question: A point of charge A of +10 µC and another point charge B of +20 µC are kept 1 m apart in free space. The electrostatic force on A due to B is <katex>$\vec{F}_{1}$</katex> and the electrostatic force on B due to A is <katex>$\vec{F}_{2}$</katex> Then
